ROOT.GetSrcPaths: SELECT a.grpindex,a.devicedesc,b.orderindex,b.devicedesc,b.deviceid FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameYSH_TPOWERSRCPATH a join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameYSH_TPOWERSRCPATH b on a.grpindex=b.grpindex and a.orderindex=0 and b.orderindex>0 order by a.grpindex, b.orderindex
